column1: #text=It was my mother 's birthday last weekend and I wanted to bake her a cake .
#text=First , I looked up a recipes on the Internet .
#text=I found a chocolate cake recipe that looked very good .
#text=I was missing a few ingredients , so I made a quick run to the grocery store .
#text=Once I had what I needed , I got to work .
#text=First , I got out all of the baking pans that I would need to bake the cake .
#text=Then I got out all the ingredients and let them sit at room temperature for a bit .
#text=After prepping the pans , I preheated the oven and stirred the dry ingredients together .
#text=Then I added the butter , sugar , eggs , and flour .
#text=After everything was mixed well , I put the mixture in the pan and then put the pan in the oven .
#text=I let it cool and then added white frosting .
